summary: A Japanese family weathers much hardship after their military uncle comes to live with them during WWII.
cast: Haruko Sugimura|Toshinosuke Nagao|Shin Tokudaiji|Mitsuko Miura|Shirô Ôsaka|Eitarô Ozawa|Natsuko Kahara|Junji Masuda|Kinji Fujiwa|Seiji Nishimura|Shôzô Suzuki|Eiko Takamatsu|Kikuko Kunigane|Eijirô Tôno
title: Ôsone-ke no ashita
